summary: Experienced Software Engineer with 8+ years of expertise in full-stack development, cloud architecture, and team leadership. Proven track record of delivering scalable solutions and driving technical innovation in fast-paced environments.

responsibilities: Led development of microservices architecture serving 2M+ daily active users, improving system reliability by 40%
Architected and implemented CI/CD pipeline reducing deployment time from 2 hours to 15 minutes
Mentored team of 5 junior engineers, conducting code reviews and establishing best practices
Spearheaded migration to AWS cloud infrastructure, reducing operational costs by 30%
Collaborated with product team to deliver 15+ major features on schedule
Developed full-stack features using React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL for B2B SaaS platform
Implemented real-time notification system handling 100K+ events per day
Optimized database queries reducing page load times by 60%
Built automated testing suite achieving 85% code coverage
Participated in on-call rotation, maintaining 99.9% uptime SLA
Built responsive web applications for 20+ clients using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP
Collaborated with designers to implement pixel-perfect UI/UX designs
Integrated third-party APIs including payment gateways and social media platforms
Provided technical support and maintenance for client websites

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
